channel.title: CVE Feed for Cybozu, Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cybozu, Inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-20768|2024-08-03T17:53:22.105Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Operational restrictions bypass vulnerability in Scheduler and MultiReport of Cybozu Garoon 4.0.0 to 5.0.2 allows a remote authenticated attacker to delete the data of Scheduler and MultiReport without the appropriate privilege.

item.title: CVE-2022-30943|2024-08-03T07:03:40.052Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Browsing restriction bypass vulnerability in Bulletin of Cybozu Garoon 4.0.0 to 5.9.1 allows a remote authenticated attacker to obtain the data of Bulletin.

item.title: CVE-2022-30693|2024-08-03T06:56:13.489Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20office
item.description: Information disclosure vulnerability in the system configuration of Cybozu Office 10.0.0 to 10.8.5 allows a remote attacker to obtain the data of the product via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-32583|2024-08-03T07:46:43.647Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20office
item.description: Operation restriction bypass vulnerability in Scheduler of Cybozu Office 10.0.0 to 10.8.5 allows a remote authenticated attacker to alter the data of Scheduler via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-26368|2024-08-03T05:03:32.781Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Browse restriction bypass and operation restriction bypass vulnerability in Cabinet of Cybozu Garoon 4.0.0 to 5.5.1 allows a remote authenticated attacker to alter and/or obtain the data of Cabinet.

item.title: CVE-2022-29471|2024-08-03T06:26:05.126Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Browse restriction bypass vulnerability in Bulletin of Cybozu Garoon allows a remote authenticated attacker to obtain the data of Bulletin.

item.title: CVE-2022-44608|2024-08-03T13:54:03.975Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20remote%20service
item.description: Uncontrolled resource consumption vulnerability in Cybozu Remote Service 4.0.0 to 4.0.3 allows a remote authenticated attacker to consume huge storage space, which may result in a denial-of-service (DoS) condition.

item.title: CVE-2022-32453|2024-08-03T07:39:51.192Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20office
item.description: HTTP header injection vulnerability in Cybozu Office 10.0.0 to 10.8.5 may allow a remote attacker to obtain and/or alter the data of the product via unspecified vectors.

item.description: Browse restriction bypass vulnerability in Custom Ap of Cybozu Office 10.0.0 to 10.8.5 allows a remote authenticated attacker to obtain the data of Custom App via unspecified vectors.

item.description: Operational restrictions bypass vulnerability in E-mail of Cybozu Garoon 4.0.0 to 5.0.2 allows a remote authenticated attacker to alter the data of Portal without the appropriate privilege.

item.description: Improper input validation vulnerability in Scheduler of Cybozu Garoon 4.0.0 to 5.5.1 allows a remote authenticated attacker to alter the data of Scheduler.

item.description: Operation restriction bypass in multiple applications of Cybozu Garoon 4.0.0 to 5.9.1 allows a remote authenticated attacker to alter the file information and/or delete the files.

item.title: CVE-2024-31400|2024-06-11T15:46:25.361Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Insertion of sensitive information into sent data issue exists in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.15.0. If this vulnerability is exploited, unintended data may be left in forwarded mail.

item.title: CVE-2024-31397|2024-06-11T13:31:56.444Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Improper handling of extra values issue exists in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.15.2. If this vulnerability is exploited, a user who can log in to the product with the administrative privilege may be able to cause a denial-of-service (DoS) condition.

item.title: CVE-2024-31401|2024-06-11T18:53:43.047Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.15.2 allows a remote authenticated attacker with an administrative privilege to inject an arbitrary script on the web browser of the user who is logging in to the product.

item.title: CVE-2024-31404|2024-06-11T14:22:13.532Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Insertion of sensitive information into sent data issue exists in Cybozu Garoon 5.5.0 to 6.0.0, which may allow a user who can log in to the product to view the data of Scheduler.

item.title: CVE-2024-31398|2024-06-11T14:54:17.236Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Insertion of sensitive information into sent data issue exists in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.15.2. If this vulnerability is exploited, a user who can log in to the product may obtain information on the list of users.

item.title: CVE-2024-31402|2024-06-11T05:21:04.938Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Incorrect authorization vulnerability in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.15.2 allows a remote authenticated attacker to delete the data of Shared To-Dos.

item.title: CVE-2024-31403|2024-06-11T13:49:23.480Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Incorrect authorization vulnerability in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 6.0.0 allows a remote authenticated attacker to alter and/or obtain the data of Memo.

item.title: CVE-2024-31399|2024-06-11T14:21:43.839Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Excessive platform resource consumption within a loop issue exists in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.15.2. If this vulnerability is exploited, processing a crafted mail may cause a denial-of-service (DoS) condition.

item.title: CVE-2024-23304|2024-02-06T04:19:49.092Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20kunai%20for%20android
item.description: Cybozu KUNAI for Android 3.0.20 to 3.0.21 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to cause a denial-of-service (DoS) condition by performing certain operations.

item.title: CVE-2024-39457|2024-07-19T16:47:46.468Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Cybozu Garoon 6.0.0 to 6.0.1 contains a cross-site scripting vulnerability in PDF preview. If this vulnerability is exploited, an arbitrary script may be executed on a logged-in user’s web browser.

item.title: CVE-2024-31401|2024-08-02T01:52:56.951Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.15.2 allows a remote authenticated attacker with an administrative privilege to inject an arbitrary script on the web browser of the user who is logging in to the product.

item.description: Incorrect authorization vulnerability in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 6.0.0 allows a remote authenticated attacker to alter and/or obtain the data of Memo.

item.description: Incorrect authorization vulnerability in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.15.2 allows a remote authenticated attacker to delete the data of Shared To-Dos.

item.description: Insertion of sensitive information into sent data issue exists in Cybozu Garoon 5.5.0 to 6.0.0, which may allow a user who can log in to the product to view the data of Scheduler.

item.description: Insertion of sensitive information into sent data issue exists in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.15.2. If this vulnerability is exploited, a user who can log in to the product may obtain information on the list of users.

item.description: Insertion of sensitive information into sent data issue exists in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.15.0. If this vulnerability is exploited, unintended data may be left in forwarded mail.

item.description: Improper handling of extra values issue exists in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.15.2. If this vulnerability is exploited, a user who can log in to the product with the administrative privilege may be able to cause a denial-of-service (DoS) condition.
